reviews.text: A real hidden gem! I Cozy, little matcha spot run by the loveliest people. The flavours are super unique (think beyond the usual matcha latte). I had the earl grey matcha and it was bomb.com.  You can really tell how much care and precision goes into every cup. Service is warm, intimate and genuineâ€”it feels more like visiting a friendâ€™s kitchen than a business. Highly recommend if you love matcha, or just want something a little different.
amazing matcha!!! the owners are so sweet and friendly and they have unique matcha flavours. charming little spot, highly recommend!

The matcha gao is really gao!! And I'm so amazed that they're using a natural sweetener too that really complements the umami of the matcha flavour.. It's a takeaway spot so be prepared to grab n go !

New matcha spot in Outram! Tried the unique thai milk tea matcha latte, and it didnâ€™t disappoint (was surprisingly a nice combi)ðŸ˜‹ If you like cinnamon, can go for the honey cinnamon matcha latte which is slightly sweeter but itâ€™s a nice blend without overpowering the matcha flavor!

Definitely worth a try if you are nearby the area, wish I stayed closer ðŸ¤£ðŸ˜†

I had a cup of normal ice matcha latte. It was brilliantly blend and the proportion of matcha and other ingredients is perfect. It doesnâ€™t taste too strong and really smooth to drink it. I personally spoke to the owner. Sheâ€™s been doing this for a decade. Strongly recommend to go and try to believe it:)
